question: 大きい順
sourceAnswer: Decreasing Order, Descending Order, Largest First
activeAnswer: Decreasing Order, Descending Order, Largest First
sourceMnemonic: When the <kanji>order</kanji> is from <kanji>big</kanji> (to small), you are talking about <vocabulary>decreasing order</vocabulary>. That's <vocabulary>largest first</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: The reading is the word <ja>大きい</ja> plus <ja>順</ja>'s reading you learned with the kanji.
